nws_periods.name: Today
nws_periods.shortForecast: Showers And Thunderstorms then Showers And Thunderstorms Likely
nws_periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms before 10am, then showers and thunderstorms likely. Partly sunny, with a high near 87. Southeast wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

nws_periods.name: Tonight
nws_periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 10pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between 10pm and 1am, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms.
